string-array.name: permissions_desc
string-array.item: Na isowa da ajiyewar hotuna, manhaja, da wasu fayiloli, har da aikawar abubuwa
Na aikawar fayiloli da Bluetooth da Wi-Fi

string-array.item: Na isowa da ajiyewar hotuna, manhaja, da wasu fayiloli, har da aikawar abubuwa

string-array.name: permissions_desc_v12
string-array.item: Na aikawar fayiloli da Bluetooth da Wi-Fi
"Na samun na'urori da akwai a kusa ta hanyar amfani da Bluetooth"
"Na samun na'urorin da akwai kusa da aikawar fayiloli ta Wi-Fi"
